TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示公共字段或属性在 序列化或反序列化包含它们的对象时表示 XML 元素。

span.span: Indicates that a public field or property represents an XML element when the serializes or deserializes the object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性, 这些属性控制序列化或反序列化对象的方式。 The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表, 请参阅[控制 XML 序列化的属性](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). XML 文档通常包含 XML 元素, 每个元素都由三个部分组成: 一个开始标记, 其中包含可能的属性、结束标记和标记之间的数据。An XML document usually contains XML elements, each of which consists of three parts: an opening tag with possible attributes, a closing tag, and the data between the tags. XML 标记可以嵌套, 也就是说, 标记之间的数据也可以是 XML 元素。XML tags can be nested--that is, the data between tags can also be XML elements. 其中一个元素要包含另一个元素的容量允许文档包含数据的层次结构。This capacity of one element to enclose another allows the document to contain hierarchies of data. XML 元素还可以包含特性。An XML element can also include attributes. 将应用于公共字段或公共读/写属性, 以控制 XML 元素的特性, 例如元素名称和命名空间。Apply the to public fields or public read/write properties to control characteristics of the XML elements such as the element name and namespace. 可以多次应用于返回对象数组的字段。The can be applied multiple times to a field that returns an array of objects. 这样做的目的是指定 (通过属性) 可以插入到数组中的不同类型。The purpose of this is to specify (through the property) different types that can be inserted into the array. 例如, 以下C#代码中的数组接受字符串和整数。For example, the array in the following C# code accepts both strings and integers. ``` public class Things{ [XmlElement(Type = typeof(string)), XmlElement(Type = typeof(int))] public object[] StringsAndInts; } ``` 这会生成类似于以下内容的 XML。This results in XML that might resemble the following. ``` Hello 999 World ``` 请注意, 在不 指定属性值的情况下应用多次时, 元素将按可接受对象的类型命名。Note that when you apply the multiple times without specifying an property value, the elements are named after the type of the acceptable objects. 如果将应用于返回数组的字段或属性, 则数组中的项将编码为 XML 元素的序列。If you apply the to a field or property that returns an array, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of XML elements. 相反, 如果未应用于这类字段或属性, 则数组中的项将编码为一系列元素, 这些元素嵌套在一个以字段或属性命名的元素下。In contrast if an is not applied to such a field or property, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of elements, nested under an element named after the field or property. (使用和属性来控制序列化数组的方式。)(Use the and attributes to control how an array is serialized.) 您可以设置属性, 以指定派生自原始字段或属性的类型的类型, 即您已应用的字段或属性。You can set the property to specify a type that is derived from the type of the original field or property--that is, the field or property to which you have applied the . 如果字段或属性返回, 则可以将多个实例应用于成员。If a field or property returns an , you can apply multiple instances of the to the member. 对于每个实例, 将属性设置为可插入到数组中的对象的类型。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. 有关使用特性的详细信息, 请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以在代码中`XmlElement`使用该单词而不是更长的时间。You can use the word `XmlElement` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例对名为`Group`的类进行序列化, 并将其应用于其多个成员。The following example serializes a class named `Group` and applies the to several of its members. 名为`Employees`的字段返回对象的`Employee`数组。The field named `Employees` returns an array of `Employee` objects. 在这种情况下 , 将指定生成的 XML 将不会嵌套 (这是数组中项的默认行为)。In this case, the specifies that the resulting XML will not be nested (which is the default behavior of items in an array). [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 序列化成员的 XML 元素名。

span.span: The XML element name of the serialized member.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在序列化类实例时, 使用成员名作为 XML 元素名称。By default, the uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance. 例如, 名为`Vehicle`的字段将生成一个名为`Vehicle`的 XML 元素。For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`. 但是`Cars`, 如果需要其他元素 (如), 请将其传递到`elementName`参数中。However if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个简单的类, 其中包含一个名`Vehicles`为的字段。The following example shows a simple class that contains a single field named `Vehicles`. 该示例将应用到字段并`elementName`包括参数, 从而指示生成名为 "汽车" 的 XML 元素, 而不是 "车辆"。The example applies the to the field and includes the `elementName` parameter, thereby instructing the to generate XML elements named "Cars" rather than "Vehicles". [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 所应用到的成员的类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies a type for the member to which the is applied.

summary.span: 此类型在序列化或反序列化包含它的对象时由 使用。

span.span: This type is used by the when serializing or deserializing object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `type`使用参数指定派生自基类的类型。Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class. 例如, 假设名为`MyAnimal`的属性`Animal`返回对象。For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object. 你需要增强对象, 以便创建一个`Mammal` `Animal`从类继承的名为的新类。You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class. 若要指示在序列化`Mammal` `MyAnimal`属性时接受类, 请将`Mammal`类的传递给构造函数。To instruct the to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the of the `Mammal` class to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名`Orchestra`为的类, 该类包含`Instruments`一个名为的字段, `Instrument`该字段返回一个对象数组。The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为`Brass`的第二个类`Instrument`从类继承。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例将应用 `Instruments`到`Brass`字段, 并指定类型, 以允许`Instruments`字段接受`Brass`对象。The example applies the to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects. 该示例还通过设置属性来指定 XML 元素的名称。The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称和 应用到的成员的派生类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the and specifies the name of the XML element and a derived type for the member to which the is applied.

summary.span: 此成员类型在 序列化包含它的对象时使用。

span.span: This member type is used when the serializes the object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 在序列化类实例时, 使用成员名作为 XML 元素名称。By default, the uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance. 例如, 名为`Vehicle`的字段将生成一个名为`Vehicle`的 XML 元素。For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`. 但是, 如果需要其他元素 (如`Cars`), 请将其传递到`elementName`参数中。However, if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter. `type`使用参数指定派生自基类的类型。Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class. 例如, 假设名为`MyAnimal`的属性`Animal`返回对象。For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object. 你需要增强对象, 以便创建一个`Mammal` `Animal`从类继承的名为的新类。You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class. 若要指示在序列化`Mammal` `MyAnimal`属性时接受类, 请将`Mammal`类的传递给构造函数。To instruct the to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the of the `Mammal` class to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名`Orchestra`为的类, 该类包含`Instruments`一个名为的字段, `Instrument`该字段返回一个对象数组。The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为`Brass`的第二个类`Instrument`从类继承。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例将应用 `Instruments`到`Brass`字段, 并指定类型, 以允许`Instruments`字段接受`Brass`对象。The example applies the to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects. 该示例还通过设置属性来指定 XML 元素的名称。The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 生成的 XMl 元素的 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition (XSD) data type of the XML element generated by the .
An XML Schema data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了具有 their.NET 等效项的 XML 架构简单数据类型。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their.NET equivalents. 对于`base64Binary` XML 架构和`hexBinary`数据类型, 请使用结构的数组, 并根据需要将设置为 "base64Binary" 或 "hexBinary" 的。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. 对于`time` XML 架构和`date`数据类型, 请使用 类型,并将设置为"日期"或"时间"。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于映射到字符串的每个 XML 架构类型, 应用其 属性设置为 XML 架构类型的。For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema type. 这可能会更改序列化格式, 而不仅是成员的架构。It is possible that this can change the serialization format, not only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 属性区分大小写, 因此必须将其精确设置为 XML 架构数据类型之一。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 元素传递比将其作为 XML 架构特性传递更为有效。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML Schema attribute. 有关 XML 数据类型的详细信息, 请参阅名为[xml 架构的万维网联合会文档第2部分:数据](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)类型。For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium document named [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/). |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|对象数组Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |条目ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|对象数组Array of objects| |IdID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整数integer|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |nameName|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |durationduration|| |stringstring|| |shortshort|| |timetime|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名`Group`为的类, 该类`ExtraInfo`包含一个名为的字段, 该字段返回。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `ExtraInfo`, which returns an . 该示例将的两个实例应用于字段, 并为每个实例指定不同的值。The example applies two instances of the to the field and specifies different values for each instance. 每个实例都允许对插入到数组中的指定类型进行序列化。Each instance enables the to serialize the specified types inserted into the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 已指定的 XML 架构数据类型无法映射到 .NET 数据类型。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the.NET data type.

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the generated XML element.
The default is the member identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望生成的 XML 元素的名称与成员的标识符不同, 请指定。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 如果生成的 xml 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分名称相同的成员, 则可以将相同的值设置为多个类成员。You can set the same value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members. 有关如何在 XML 文档中使用命名空间和带前缀名称的详细信息, 请参见类。For details on how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例将的属性设置为新值。The following example sets the property of an to a new value. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素是否是限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定 XML 元素是否是限定的或非限定的。The property determines whether an XML element is qualified or unqualified. 属性符合万维网联合会1999规范, 即[XML 中的命名空间。](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/) The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium 1999 specification, [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/). 如果将 `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`属性设置为任何值, 尝试将属性设置为会引发异常。 If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认设置`XmlSchemaForm.None` 指示检查 XML 文档的架构, 以确定命名空间是否是限定的。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果架构未指定单个元素或属性的值, 则将 `elementFormDefault`使用和`attributeFormDefault`值来确定是否限定了某个元素或属性。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 以下 XML 代码显示了一个架构:The following XML code shows a schema: ``` ``` `XmlSchemaForm.None` `Number`当读取架构时, `Name`和`Number`的值为, 但`Name`元素是限定的, 而元素是非限定的。 When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下面的示例将属性设置为。 `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`The following example sets the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将设置为 的成员序列化为 属性设置为 的空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member that is set to as an empty tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档显式通知缺少某个元素的内容。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含将特性`xsi:nil`设置为`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XML 架构第1部分中的万维网联合会规范:结构](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)。For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium specification, [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/). 如果将`true` `xsi:nil`属性设置为, 则为已设置为`null`的类成员生成属性。 If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如, 如果将名`MyStringArray`为的字段设置为`null`, 则会生成以下 XML 代码。For example if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果属性为`false`, 则不会为已设置为`null`的类成员生成 XML 元素。 If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. > [!NOTE] > 不能将属性应用于类型为值类型的成员, 因为值类型不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. 此外, 不能将此属性设置`false`为可为 null 的值类型。Additionally, you cannot set this property to `false` for nullable value types. 当这样的类型`null`为时, 将通过将设置`xsi:nil`为`true`来序列化这些类型。When such types are `null`, they will be serialized by setting `xsi:nil` to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个应用了的字段, 并将属性设置为`false`。The following example shows a field with the applied to it, and the property set to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给 XML 元素的命名空间，这些 XML 元素是在序列化类时得到的。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace assigned to the XML element that results when the class is serialized.
The namespace of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合万维网联合会规范, 即[XML 中的命名空间。](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/) The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium specification, [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/). 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间, 必须创建一个 , 其中包含 XML 文档中使用的命名空间和前缀。To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 当你为每个设置命名空间时, 它必须匹配中的一个命名空间。As you set the namespace for each , it must match one of the namespaces in the . 生成 XML 时, 每个数组都以与指定命名空间关联的前缀正确地加上前缀。When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化或反序列化元素的显式顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
The order of the code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用枚举来 指示生成用于设置属性的代码。 Use the enumeration to instruct the to generate code that sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在类型中的一个公共属性或字段上使用该属性后, 必须将该属性应用于该类型和所有继承类型的所有公共属性和字段。Once the property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于表示 XML 元素的对象类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the object type used to represent the XML element.
The of the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定字段或属性的派生类型。Use the property to specify a derived type for a field or property. 如果字段或属性返回, 则可以将多个实例应用于成员。If a field or property returns an , you can apply multiple instances of the to the member. 对于每个实例, 将属性设置为可插入到数组中的对象的类型。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性指定的派生对象。 The following example uses the property to specify a derived object for an . 该示例还将的三个实例应用于一个返回的字段。The example also applies three instances of the to a field that returns an . 每个实例指定字段中允许的类型。Each instance specifies a type allowed in the field. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
